services.name: server
services.buildCommand: NODE_ENV=development pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile --prefer-offline && NODE_ENV=development pnpm --filter @realenhance/shared run build && NODE_ENV=development pnpm --filter @realenhance/server run build

services.name: worker
services.buildCommand: NODE_ENV=development pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile --prefer-offline && NODE_ENV=development pnpm --filter @realenhance/shared run build && NODE_ENV=development pnpm --filter @realenhance/worker run build
